title: Baby Carrier (?)
description: overall scroll applique in circular patterns edged in pink and tan cording; center 15\" red background; side borders, 5-1/2\" gray background; corner and center appliques of green silk; black background and lining
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
